char_500_noirc.name: The Other Side of the Deck
description: Life only truly begins after you get off work.

char_501_durin.name: Lunchtime Nap
description: As long as it doesn't hold up work, there's nothing wrong with sleeping in a little.

char_123_fang.name: Second Charge
description: When you gain greater strength, you must assume greater responsibility. Raised as the captain of the squad, Fang, too, wants to prove she deserves to have hope placed in her.

char_124_kroos.name: Apples
description: Chance idleness can have a ripple effect like you'd never predict.

char_121_lava.name: 'Sisters'
description: Looking for a big sister?

char_121_lava.name: 'Caring'
description: Just who is taking care of whom?

char_208_melan.name: Team Captain
description: You see how wonderful other people are, and other people see you just the same.

char_209_ardign.name: It'll Be Fine, Guaranteed!
description: Cardigan likes running. Cardigan's good at running. Cardigan, right now, has gotta run!

char_108_silent.name: New to the Workforce
description: The way forward is a tough and tricky one, but as new blood, she's done well enough already.

char_134_ifrit.name: Team Captain
description: She thinks the person she's looking after has gotten thin, but according to them, she's just gotten tall.

char_128_plosis.name: Deep, Dark Dream
description: A late friend, an odd Originium device, an uncanny muttering. All these mysteries buried in the depths of her soul, buried by her.

char_242_otter.name: One Packed Daily Schedule
description: Every day's non-stop, round the clock. There's bad times, there's good times.

char_242_otter.name: Heart of Creation
description: From Rhine Lab to Rhodes Island, they've always come with.

char_215_mantic.name: Dead Silence
description: She trembles and shudders, scared even of the sound when she speaks.

char_149_scave.name: The Will of a Coin
description: She knows the rules of survival well, and leaves everything else to the flip of a coin.

char_204_platnm.name: Bubbles
description: 'If only life and dreams could all be a little more interesting...'

char_172_svrash.name: Unpredictable
description: A rare-to-see counterpart; a hard-to-meet opponent.

char_172_svrash.name: Unbreakable Ice
description: Eternity does not melt; eternity does not forsake.

char_173_slchan.name: Heart of the Cliffs
description: 'The climb is easy; the descent is hard.'

char_174_slbell.name: Beyond the Snowy Mountain
description: Her first time leaving Kjerag, but not her first time looking outwards.

char_199_yak.name: One Day
description: Matterhorn has stewed this bowl of soup the whole day.

char_219_meteo.name: Firefly's Light
description: That is our language, and every single word is full of reminiscence and hope.

char_158_milu.name: On My Way
description: The one who survived walks the road of revenge.

char_115_headbr.name: Strong Meets Stronger
description: Don't think too hard about it, just go and have some fun.

char_115_headbr.name: Burning on a Winter Night
description: If not for this fire... No, there is no if.

char_195_glassb.name: Let's Go, Let's Go
description: The shadow of that city is far too long. She has to hurry, be faster, or else she'll be engulfed by the past.

char_196_sunbr.name: Lost Companion
description: To a child, nothing really beats the company of loved ones.

char_196_sunbr.name: Growing Up
description: Gummy will do anything to protect the friends by her side.

char_179_cgbird.name: A Song and a Blue Feather
description: One who cannot see her own hopes, still wishing yet to bring hope to others.

char_155_tiger.name: The Guide to Mutual Learning
description: To go from a street thug to an excellent Operator takes a decent few deep breaths.

char_101_sora.name: Distance
description: It's an idol's job to bring hope to people, and not just on the stage.

char_102_texas.name: Guaranteed Success
description: Who knew there'd come a day when you deliver to the losers?

char_103_angel.name: Incoming Mail
description: Don't worry too much about Laterano people, they can cope fine no matter where they end up.

char_103_angel.name: Constants Within Changes
description: Live in the present and enjoy it.

char_201_moeshd.name: The Business
description: You buy, you sell, and when it leaves your hands, it's gone like smoke.

char_118_yuki.name: The Way of Shinobi
description: The Princess once said, unwise is blind loyalty.

char_106_franka.name: Symbols of the Past
description: The flowers and trees around her could be symbols of days gone, or of nothing at all; it is all in her mind.

char_107_liskam.name: 'Apple Pie Party, Now Preparing!'
description: A serious look? Won't fly here.

char_107_liskam.name: 'Still Waiting'
description: After leaving home, one longs to protect the rebirth of one's origin.

char_117_myrrh.name: Lucky Charm
description: Sometimes, people want to believe that something is real, even when they know it isn't.

char_193_frostl.name: Learning to Read
description: When all's said and done, just what is 'a new life' to a roving mercenary?

char_129_bluep.name: Untouchable
description: The farthest distance is the one from legend to reality.

char_143_ghost.name: Merry Christmas!
description: A precious chance at a gift exchange, bearing a sincere heart upon its back. Can she sense it?

char_143_ghost.name: I, Namely I
description: A long, long-awaited, yet all too brief reuniting, and a torrent of words her mind wants to speak. She wants to relay all that she can.

char_181_flower.name: 'Refurbishment Plans'
description: Flowers grow, and gardens expand.

char_181_flower.name: How Old Trees Grow
description: It's no mere nostalgia, nor simple hatred. Perhaps this complicated feeling is what you call 'homesickness.'

char_109_fmout.name: 'Divination'
description: Giving a few useless directions to the lost.

char_126_shotst.name: Scalding Old Memories
description: Bygone recollections are beasts, the pursuers behind you.

char_126_shotst.name: Dilemma
description: The moons aren't always consummate, and the world has many a shortcoming.

char_127_estell.name: One Small Step For Her
description: Every thought held in your heart will bloom, one day or another.

char_141_nights.name: 'Kitties'
description: 'Meow—.' By their side, she seems to relax, to be pleased, to be totally content.

char_145_prove.name: Coworkers
description: Of course life is precious. You, I and all of us are precious alike.

char_145_prove.name: A Perilous Road
description: Catastrophe and man-made disaster; when both weave together, what should she do?

char_183_skgoat.name: Extra Work
description: Leisure time: inevitably interrupted by work.

char_183_skgoat.name: Distant Relic
description: Sometimes, work is the simpler part of living.

char_241_panda.name: Nosedive
description: When it grows on the cliffside, even the sturdiest bamboo fears a change in the wind.

char_180_amgoat.name: Heart of a Scholar
description: The darkness pursues her, and she pursues the light.

char_180_amgoat.name: Volcano
description: That once burnt away is truth, and eternity too.

char_185_frncat.name: Sweetheart
description: For a new loaf of bread, feelings and affection are the best ingredients.

char_163_hpsts.name: Forging
description: She mends more than just weapons; she mends what they mean to their users.

char_171_bldsk.name: 'Monster'
description: 'Monsters' have their own way in the world too.

char_171_bldsk.name: Rarely Serious
description: She's lived for centuries, after all.

char_110_deepcl.name: Azure Memories
description: That is her own shade of blue.

char_166_skfire.name: Old Classmate
description: People pick up all sorts of tricks while you're away.

char_240_wyvern.name: Originium Slugs and Hops
description: Man's relationship with nature is always full of issues, but down at the root, it's all people issues.

char_236_rope.name: Floral Perfume
description: Foreigners always have some mystical fantasies, but unfortunately, not every Yan person can hop between roofs and walk on walls.
To true lovers of gardening, there's blooming flowers and bearing fruits, but what warrants closer attention is the soil itself.

char_237_gravel.name: Past in Dreams
description: One's parents and hometown; the origins every child is forever looking for.

char_286_cast3.name: Immortal
description: Keep running, Castle-3.

char_285_medic2.name: A Piece of Graffiti
description: The raddest robot, and the raddest friend.

char_009_12fce.name: Certain Choices
description: His past isn't secret, it's completely empty.

char_278_orchid.name: Incomplete
description: The moment the scissors tear through the dress, it is too late to regret anything.

char_235_jesica.name: The Slow Walk Ahead
description: She walks slowly, and the path she chose isn't the easiest one in the eyes of others.

char_290_vigna.name: What You've Gotta Do
description: Rock 'n' roll can be your whole hobby, but it doesn't have to be your whole life.

char_277_sqrrel.name: Careful of Flammables
description: Firefighters never fear fire. She just fears people losing far too many precious things to it.

char_277_sqrrel.name: Flammables
description: Sooner or later, every fireman learns how it feels to fail to save a life.

char_291_aglina.name: 'Package with No Recipient'
description: Messengers rarely make mistakes at work, since fixing them is always rough.
A good Messenger shares the feelings between people.

char_192_falco.name: A Grand, Distant Ideal
description: She'll bear that old halberd, and she'll go on.

char_230_savage.name: Painful Reversal
description: A responsibility, an opportunity.

char_230_savage.name: No Less Than a Pie
description: Why's Savage so affectionate towards Cautus? Eh, the Cautus are meant to huddle up all nice and cozy together, aren't they!
Eat a slice of carrot pie, and listen to her thoughts.

char_282_catap.name: Break Free
description: When you can no longer stand your life as it is, smash it apart and choose a new one.

char_282_catap.name: Change
description: How much can time really change?

char_283_midn.name: Letter From Home
description: Maybe looking back isn't all that bad, every now and then.

char_137_brownb.name: Ending Bell
description: A match closes out to its ring, but the bell just signals the start of the next.

char_263_skadi.name: Endless Journey
description: She always thought she was the last Abyssal Hunter.

char_284_spot.name: Face of the Hero
description: Perhaps accepting your true self is in its way a heroic achievement?

char_281_popka.name: Funtime
description: Putting young Operators in the playroom is the peak of safety. How could anything possibly happen?

char_308_swire.name: Day Before the Job
description: The family is humanity's eternal motif. Young children will always take family to be all there is to life, but if it crashes against this land of ours when it tries to decide all their days to come, it may end up no more than an inconsequential ripple.

char_253_greyy.name: Filter Stars
description: He lights a corner of the night sky after his mother.

char_010_chen.name: In One Effort
description: Swell, then ebb.

char_298_susuro.name: Professional Doctor
description: Sussurro is frequently misjudged by others for her appearance, but she really is a professional doctor.

char_274_astesi.name: Revelation
description: There are more than just the stars that can light up tomorrow.

char_326_glacus.name: On My Own Two Legs
description: She doesn't need others to recognize it. In Glaucus's heart, technology takes its own shape.

char_348_ceylon.name: Heartfelt Present
description: The search for truth is far more difficult than she imagined, but she learned to seek the encouragement and support from those who walk the same path.

char_340_shwaz.name: 'The Day We Left Home'
description: What is the meaning of life? That is the question.

char_188_helage.name: Fate
description: Knights and generals, wars and arrogance, country and Infected.

char_260_durnar.name: Extra Training
description: Training is all about facing your fears.

char_260_durnar.name: A Glass with Old Stories
description: Have a drink after nine, and watch your worries fade into greater worries.

char_355_ethan.name: 'Old Friends in Foreign Places'
description: A thing long past, an old friend, or a forgettable experience. The past never stops haunting Ethan.

char_275_breeze.name: Breeze's Warmth, Chilled Forest
description: To shed a noble identity does not entail running away.

char_275_breeze.name: Prisoner's Dream
description: They are dissatisﬁed with their present, and devote their lives to another path, but in the end, there was no path leading to happiness. The cycle repeats, time runs out, and only sorrow remains.

char_248_mgllan.name: Cycle of Life
description: The old before her sang while planting the seeds, and Magallan sees to it those seeds grow into great flowers.

char_213_mostma.name: Atop the Skyscrapers
description: Not all wishes have an outcome.

char_325_bison.name: A Fulfilling Holiday
description: It's best to learn how to take a vacation before learning how to work.

char_243_waaifu.name: What Martial Arts Serve
description: Strength is needed to uphold justice, but not every problem can be solved by strength.

char_133_mm.name: The Great Detective's Case Files - Volume I
description: The shining star of Victorian Detectives! The Great Detective Metis Geraldine's memorable first case!

char_356_broca.name: The First Step Towards Trust
description: If you want someone to trust you, the best method of proof is action.

char_017_huang.name: Will You?
description: Countless people have traveled this road too, or perhaps are about to.

char_2014_nian.name: A Thousand Years in a Sigh
description: Nian's films have oddball and bizarre stories, but occasionally, she slips something a little more serious in.

char_225_haak.name: A Night of Terror
description: The more you panic, the messier it gets.

char_226_hmau.name: South Wall
description: The whimpering of conscience is drowned out by the clanging of gold and silver in the bowl.

char_383_snsant.name: A Dilemma of Values
description: Facing a target that was too high for her at the moment, she becomes anxious, but still steadily makes her way towards it, step by step.

char_2013_cerber.name: XXL Honey Biscuit
description: Children of the barrens will apply nature's norms in civilized society.

char_222_bpipe.name: Dangerous Road
description: It's her way, and she will go.

char_379_sesa.name: Fatal Attraction
description: This may be a rare break in Sesa's search for the truth, or it may be the most carefully laid of traps.

char_252_bibeak.name: Shell Break
description: A fowlbeast is not truly born if it does not break free of its own eggshell and see the blue sky with its own eyes.

char_252_bibeak.name: Through the Long Hallway
description: Bibeak received two letters, one from her parents and the other from the man who had hurt her.

char_376_therex.name: Scorching-Hot Assault!
description: There is no hottest, only hotter still! THRM-EX is forever on the journey to heat up and buff up!

char_301_cutter.name: Meals, Ready-to-Eat
description: Mercenaries are like MREs. Mercenaries only ever get to eat MREs.

char_254_vodfox.name: A Curse Without Words
description: She knows fear very well, as well as how to dispel it, and so she turns the page of her book.

char_333_sidero.name: Diligent
description: The Instructor team has thought of a good way to deal with Sideroca.

char_401_elysm.name: Long Journey
description: After leaving home, have you seen the different sights you wished to see?

char_250_phatom.name: Cooperation
description: People intersect in all sorts of ways. It's inevitable, and no-one's an exception.

char_400_weedy.name: Together Aboard
description: It isn't a fear of the elements that stops her heading for faraway places.

char_373_lionhd.name: Living in Darkness
description: We'll see each other again, safe and sound.

char_378_asbest.name: Strange Sights
description: The Archosauria love outsiders!

char_343_tknogi.name: An Ordinary Sunset
description: There was a sunset like that, the day I left Higashi.

char_258_podego.name: Bloom Season
description: May the floral fragrance bring happiness to all.

char_328_cammou.name: Unmanned Workshop
description: Knock, knock, knock, who's at the door? Come on into the workshop where nobody's home—

char_344_beewax.name: Trail of Sands
description: To seek out the way home for life is also to seek your own destination.

char_336_folivo.name: Recorder
description: There are few words that she finds worthwhile to say with her own mouth.

char_294_ayer.name: Seeker in the Sands
description: Leonhardt... He's my employer.

char_349_chiave.name: Masterpiece
description: Chiave insists that his next work will be his magnum opus, but his two friends still think that 'she' was the peak of his car repairing career.

char_293_thorns.name: Anniversary
description: To act according to your own intent, regardless of background.

char_272_strong.name: Roll With Your Mistakes
description: Jaye's fearsome appearance often brings trouble, but it comes in handy from time to time.

char_272_strong.name: VIP
description: Times change, and so do the people we used to know. That's how an average seafood hawker became a 'key man.' He knows in his heart what he lost on his way here and what he must protect on the road ahead.

char_366_acdrop.name: The Face of a Wall
description: They pluck the things that grow spontaneously from the soil, chop, grind, and dilute them until you can no longer recognize their original form, and then paint the walls with their toy.

char_411_tomimi.name: Brand New Life
description: Can you be both hedonistic and head-over-heels in longing?

char_415_flint.name: Warrior's Due
description: If your fists still aren't big enough, you need to grab hold of some other way to solve problems.

char_365_aprl.name: Hunter's Vision
description: Whether one loves or hates others—a question she ultimately elects not to ask.

char_388_mint.name: Yesterday Once More
description: Have you ever asked yourself, 'just how did you get so attached?'

char_346_aosta.name: Future Woven
description: Perhaps this is the way of life he wanted. Perhaps he could seize it with his own hands.

char_265_sophia.name: Exclusive Interview
description: Her bag is always stuffed to the brim, so when she needs to find a set of keys, it always takes some time and effort.

char_423_blemsh.name: Ready to Serve
description: Maybe the essence of ideals lies in whether you believe.

char_436_whispr.name: Before the Rain
description: There are ailments that cannot be healed, but people live on.

char_347_jaksel.name: A Priceless Medal
description: In the moment of crisis, Jackie is driven by only one thought: I would never stand idly by and watch someone die.

char_264_f12yin.name: Unexpected Annoyance
description: Oftentimes, worries spring from little nooks and crannies.

char_264_f12yin.name: Sinner's Path
description: Though hesitant, one must still clench their fists and face the long, long walk ahead.

char_440_pinecn.name: Yours Sincerely
description: Workers will always harbor visions of beauty, be it aboard nomadic cities or aboard Rhodes Island.

char_332_archet.name: Idol Promotion
description: Publicity campaigns always need a representative, and for the sake of maintaining appearances, they will always be shackled to their obligations.

char_338_iris.name: The Candy House
description: In the world of fairy tales, children who cannot speak, adults who hide far away, the silent teapots and candlesticks can all be heard if you listen carefully.

char_452_bstalk.name: The Wilds Do They Call
description: There'll always be people who need to be taught respect. All those who look down on the little Metal Crabs will pay for their shallowness.

char_402_tuye.name: Desert Rainbow
description: There is no greater treasure in the desert than water.

char_455_nothin.name: Drowning
description: He bid farewell to the kindness of the city, but cannot escape the hatred that follows him.

char_2015_dusk.name: Dawn and Dusk
description: He only has tonight.

char_363_toddi.name: Armor and Crossbow
description: Never go on a mission without the right teammates.

char_304_zebra.name: Untimeliness
description: The long knife in the soldier's hand was supposed to have cut through the enemy's shield, but it was now pointed at their comrade's back.

char_474_glady.name: Dehydration
description: Gladiia is forced to adapt to all that a state of waterlessness brings.

char_426_billro.name: Protector's Nature
description: The older sister has her way of handling things. Naturally, the younger sister also has her own way of dealing with things.

char_478_kirara.name: Secret Ending
description: 'No twists along the way at all, it all went smooth.'

char_478_kirara.name: No-Damage Clear
description: 'All according to plan!'

char_469_indigo.name: Hardcore Drink
description: You want to down the stuff in one? You won't need a hardy liver—you'll need a heart that's considerate of your friends.

char_437_mizuki.name: The Fifth Contact
description: It's all up to you—whether you're ready to bear every responsibility, and every consequence, that you and him incur.

char_1013_chen2.name: Belonging
description: Before you truly learn about something, try not to recklessly evaluate it.

char_1013_chen2.name: Pathways
description: Avoid apathy, abandon habits, endure instability, maintain pain.

char_486_takila.name: Taste of Thorns
description: Although the waves continue to beat against the shore, the young man has made his decision regarding his ambitions.

char_479_sleach.name: A Pair of Fowlbeasts
description: As the flag rose, so did her hopes and expectations.

char_473_mberry.name: A Prayer for Peace
description: She used to feel trapped by her ambition, and dared not look back; but now, she hopes to give this blessing and hope to many others.

char_484_robrta.name: Elegy
description: The performers of a dirge perform for their own sake.

char_1014_nearl2.name: Starting Point
description: Reality is no competition, and there's no day of unconditional victory.

char_496_wildmn.name: Aspiration
description: Which side is the real him?

char_489_serum.name: Corroserum's Badge
description: Dreams, passions, ideals and will are all not corrosion-resistant, so everyone, please pay careful attention and take care of yourself while at work, thank you.

char_449_glider.name: A Bitterest Rhizome
description: Prejudices and misunderstandings can seem stuck in place, but there's got to be someone, and there will be someone, who'll do something or other.

char_422_aurora.name: What She Saw
description: Aurora looks up at the sky, but the sky has no fantastic aurora for her. Aurora looks down at her feet, and sees herself standing firm in place, protecting herself and the friends behind her.

char_4019_ncdeer.name: Great Compassion
description: If kindness is exploited, how should the mood within be quelled?

char_476_blkngt.name: Souls of the Wilderness
description: She won't always be there, but she will be when needed.

char_492_quercu.name: Final Moments
description: The deceased lie in peace, but the living are not easily spared from the shadows of death.

char_492_quercu.name: The Sprouts of Life
description: Survival is a kind of greed, understandable, but should not be indulged.

char_2023_ling.name: From a Long Dream Woken
description: From Jiangnan to Saibei, to this anonymous pavilion at Shangshu's summit, a thousand spans, a hundred worldly ways, are all no more than an intoxicating dream.

char_322_lmlee.name: Three Square Meals a Day
description: Whenever you're in someplace new, check out the local wet market.

char_300_phenxi.name: Paradisus
description: The word 'home' only gains meaning once you have left it.

char_4016_kazema.name: One Should, One Must
description: No longer a shinobi, and no longer bound by devotion, but she long since pledged her loyalty to her current job.

char_4039_horn.name: Solo
description: Even if she is the last man standing on the battlefield, even if there is no end in sight to this war, even if all she can do is try her best to stand...

char_4040_rockr.name: Six Hundred Pounds
description: This snow falls from first light to last, and from last to first again.

char_1023_ghost2.name: Selfhood
description: With her memories back, Specter wants to reascertain her own likeness.

char_4009_irene.name: Lantern's Twilight
description: It is no easy matter to act according to your beliefs.

char_4042_lumen.name: Till the Lights Shine Bright
description: Ægirian, what keeps you still in Gran Faro?

char_4043_erato.name: The Epic of Heroes
description: The wandering bard from Minos, Erato, knows where the heroes lie.

char_433_windft.name: Lone Dance at the Old Factory
description:
'The lights shine bright in the factory tonight, / Like the sunset when I spoke my love to you.'
—As the song most sung by the workers goes.

char_4046_ebnhlz.name: Lone Lamp
description: The night is deep, and the cold rain is quiet. A lone lamp tries its best to shine, hoping that the sunken sun does not freeze during the night.

char_1024_hbisc2.name: Nameless Flower
description: The prophesied devil came to The Afterglow, but took disaster away.

char_4048_doroth.name: Where is the Friend's House?
description: Dorothy Franks, I suggest you cooperate. This conversation will be recorded in its entirety.

char_1027_greyy2.name: Light, He Wrote
description: By pen he notes down data, and the people he wants to thank too.

char_1026_gvial2.name: In the Name of Alcohol!
description: Getting people to say bye to the bottle's tricky, even just for the time being, when they're drunk out of their gourds.

char_4055_bgsnow.name: Fallen Inktrails
description: She wants to escape her black past, but it is also the only thing she can speak about.

char_497_ctable.name: A Fowl Through the Window
description: The fowlbeast pulls out a grain of rice and places it in front of Cantabile, turning its eyes up at her.

char_4067_lolxh.name: Sleepwalker Sailing
description: There are some nights when sleepiness just doesn't come when it should, and longing takes its place.

char_4062_totter.name: A Plan
description: It may be an overgrown ruins, but it'll still catch the warm gaze of the setting sun.

char_4071_peper.name: Mercenary Youth
description: A naive Sarkaz like her will have no future. I hope your luck is good enough, brat. Enough to live a little longer than we do.

char_4063_quartz.name: No Regrets
description: I'm sorry... I had no other choice.

char_427_vigil.name: Future Coming
description: Time shall judge me.

char_297_hamoni.name: Solitary Dancer
description: When did it start? She had gotten used to watching the others flatter, conspire and hustle.

char_2024_chyue.name: Once Upon a Time, I Wandered Afar
description: He has always been here. But does he truly belong here?

char_154_morgan.name: Beneath the Worthy Wheel
description: On the page torn out of 'Morgan's Memoirs' was a wonderful pipe dream, but the future is demanding something be filled in, and she'll find an answer.
